other_tests.findings: Grew mupirocin-resistant MRSA with a minimum inhibitory concentration of 11024 mg/mL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Grew MRSA in follow-up cultures on 26 April, 18 May, and 11 June 2001, indicating persistence despite treatment.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated identical chromosomal pattern of MRSA isolates from the patient, his wife, and the dog.
Grew MRSA with the same susceptibility pattern as the previous isolates.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Second culture on 13 August 2001 confirmed presence of MRSA.

other_tests.procedure_name: Culture of samples from dogâ€™s nares
other_tests.findings: Initially grew MRSA; subsequent cultures after treatment were negative.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-treatment cultures 30 October 2001 for the couple and dog were negative for MRSA.
Patient and wife remained free of MRSA infection four months after decolonization therapy.
